text: فانهم لءاكلون منها فمالـون منها البطون

translations.translation: They will eat from it and fill their bellies with it.
They will eat and fill their bellies with it,
(The people of Hell) will surely eat of it, filling their bellies with it.
The dwellers of hell will eat that fruit and fill-up their bellies.
So indeed they will eat from it, and fill their bellies with it.
Truly, they will eat thereof and fill their bellies therewith.
Then most surely they shall eat of it and fill (their) bellies with it.
and they eat of it, and of it fill their bellies,
And lo! they verily must eat thereof, and fill (their) bellies therewith.
They will eat from it and fill their bellies with it;
And verily they must eat thereof and fill their bellies therewith.
They will eat from it and gorge with it their bellies.
Truly they will eat thereof and fill their bellies therewith.
Truly, they will eat thereof and fill their bellies therewith.
on it they shall feed, and with it they shall fill their bellies.
They will eat from it, and fill their bellies with it.
And indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.
[37:66] And indeed they, the disbelievers, will eat of it, despite its vileness, because of the severity of their hunger, and will fill their bellies from it.
(And lo! They) i.e. the people of Mecca as well as all the disbelievers (verily must eat thereof) of the tree of Zaqqum, (and fill (their) bellies therewith) and fill their bellies of it.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ فَإِنَّهُمْ } أي: أولئك المنكرون المستهزئون
 وجميع من في النار من الكافرون { لآكِلُونَ مِنْهَا } إذ لا مأكول لهم فيها سواها { فَمَالِئُونَ مِنْهَا ٱلْبُطُونَ } [الصافات: 66] أي: يملئون بطونهم منها
 لشدة الجوع
 أو يجبرون لأكلها
 زجراً عليهم وتشديداً لعذابهم
 إذ هي أحر من النار وأبرد من الزمهرير
